name: stoked-sparksurfer
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.
short_effect: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

flavor_text.sun_moon: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Alolan Raichu, attacks the target with full force. This move leaves the target with paralysis.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Alolan Raichu, attacks the target with full force. This move leaves the target with paralysis.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Alolan Raichu, attacks the target with full force. This move leaves the target with paralysis.
